name: 2024 The 6th International Conference on Materials and Intelligent Manufacturing
content: Publication: Option 1: Accepted papers will be published in below listed journals of Scientific.Net collection. Papers will be sent for indexing by Scopus, Inspec, Chemical Abstracts Service, Google Scholar etc. \*\*Defect and Diffusion Forum (DDF) ISSN print 1012-0386 ISSN web 1662-9507 \*\*Solid State Phenomena (SSP) ISSN print 1012-0394 ISSN web 1662-9779 \*\*Materials Science Forum (MSF) ISSN print 0255-5476 ISSN web 1662-9752 \*\*Key Engineering Materials (KEM) ISSN print 1013-9826 ISSN web 1662-9795 Option 2: The accepted papers with registration and presentation will be published into PEMM Conference Proceedings as special chapter, which is indexed by Scopus, Ei Compendex, CPCI (Web of Science) etc.
